title: Melodies that linger
brief_description: A straightforward presentation of 40s vintage pop songs - “Number 10 Lullaby Lane” featuring singer Marilyn Stuart; “A Lover Is Blue”, Tommy Reynolds and his orchestra with Phyllis Lane the singer; “Penthouse Serenade” with singers Johnny Downs and Gale Storm.
